lcInstruction.p: In DITA, a constraint lets you eliminate elements that you do not need or want to use. For example, if you are not documenting software code, you could eliminate <codeblock> and <codephrase>. Constraining reduces the number of elements presented to the authors, which makes their lives a little easier.
